channel.title: Spring Festival on DevOps & SRE Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Spring Festival on DevOps & SRE Blog

item.title: My firecrackers for beginning of the year of ox 2009
item.description: 爆竹声声辞旧岁 火树银花迎金牛 In childhood, I was playing firecrackers everyday in the Spring Festival. The new year’s eve is the only chance for me to lit it again, I felt I like a 10 years child.
